snp1.6:92:
92
"Suvijāno bhavaṁ hoti, suvijāno parābhavo;
	Dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hoti,
	dhammadessī parābhavo".
snp1.6:93:
93
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, paṭhamo so parābhavo;
	Dutiyaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:94:
94
"Asantassa piyā honti, sante na kurute piyaṁ;
	Asataṁ dhammaṁ roceti,
	taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:95:
95
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, dutiyo so parābhavo;
	Tatiyaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:96:
96
"Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
	Alaso kodhapaññāṇo,
	taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:97:
97
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, tatiyo so parābhavo;
	Catutthaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:98:
98
"Yo mātaraṁ pitaraṁ vā, jiṇṇakaṁ gatayobbanaṁ;
	Pahu santo na bharati,
	taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:99:
99
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, catuttho so parābhavo;
	Pañcamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:100:
100
"Yo brāhmaṇaṁ samaṇaṁ vā, Aññaṁ vāpi vanibbakaṁ;
	Musāvādena vañceti,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:101:
101
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Pañcamo so parābhavo;
	Chaṭṭhamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:102:
102
"Pahūtavitto puriso, Sahirañño sabhojano;
	Eko bhuñjati sādūni,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:103:
103
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Chaṭṭhamo so parābhavo;
	Sattamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:104:
104
"Jātitthaddho dhanatthaddho, Gottatthaddho ca yo naro;
	Saññātiṁ atimaññeti,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:105:
105
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Sattamo so parābhavo;
	Aṭṭhamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:106:
106
"Itthidhutto surādhutto, Akkhadhutto ca yo naro;
	Laddhaṁ laddhaṁ vināseti,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:107:
107
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Aṭṭhamo so parābhavo;
	Navamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:108:
108
"Sehi dārehi asantuṭṭho, Vesiyāsu padussati;
	Dussati paradāresu,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:109:
109
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Navamo so parābhavo;
	Dasamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:110:
110
"Atītayobbano poso, Āneti timbarutthaniṁ;
	Tassā issā na supati,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:111:
111
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Dasamo so parābhavo;
	Ekādasamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:112:
112
"Itthiṁ soṇḍiṁ vikiraṇiṁ, Purisaṁ vāpi tādisaṁ;
	Issariyasmiṁ ṭhapeti,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:113:
113
"Iti hetaṁ vijānāma, Ekādasamo so parābhavo;
	Dvādasamaṁ bhagavā brūhi,
	Kiṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ".
snp1.6:114:
114
"Appabhogo mahātaṇho, Khattiye jāyate kule;
	So ca rajjaṁ patthayati,
	Taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ.
snp1.6:115:
115
Ete parābhave loke, Paṇḍito samavekkhiya;
	Ariyo dassanasampanno,
	Sa lokaṁ bhajate sivan"ti.
